name: Pacifist
description:
Pacifist is top-down shooter, where you will attempt to rob a bank while avoiding killing anyone. Game was made for weekly game jam #59 on theme "pacifist" in five days.

Controls: (there is tutorial in game)

  • Move around with [W, A, S, D]
  • Fire with [LEFT MOUSE BUTTON]
  • Open doors and take hostages with [RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON]
  • Stop game with [Escape]

Game mechanic:

Try to destroy all cameras and take all hostages before cops surround you!

NOTE:  Resolution settings were added
